title: Secretive
description: They see me as weak.Just a scared kid.The moment my big sister took me away from the club, it sealed my fate as a burden.As the son of a president for the Houston Defiance MC, I was born into power. I’m destined to lead. My father and older brother before me, I should follow in their footsteps. But they don’t see me that way.The only path to keep me safe is to ship me off.To live a life they have chosen for me.Doesn’t matter what I want.Behind the ivy-covered walls of Stonewall are mysteries, lies, deception.I want to uncover it all.The sting of secrets is to be revealed.One thing I wasn’t counting on was Thayleah, a fellow student who takes my breath away the second I see her.But she’s tied to another club.When enemies come in all forms, you need to keep your eyes open.But I didn’t see this coming!From USA Today Bestselling Authors K E Osborn and Addison Jane, comes the highly-anticipated seventh book in the Houston Defiance MC Series. Part of this book was previously released in The Elites Anthology 2021.
author: K.E. Osborn
